original_title: ‘Joint Himalayan Declaration’ promoting a pluralistic Sri Lanka presented to President
original_body_lines: The Global Tamil Forum (GTF) and the Buddhist Monastic have called on President Ranil Wickremesinghe on Thursday (Dec.07) to hand over the Joint Himalayan Declaration.
President’s Media Division (PMD) says the declaration promotes a pluralistic Sri Lanka that prioritizes the well-being of the community.
It also encourages learning from historical mistakes and stresses the importance of accountability measures.
